briefTitle: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Desoximetasone (DSXS) With Atopic Dermatitis

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

\- male and non-pregnant females, age 6 months or older, with a confirmed diagnosis of moderate to severe atopic dermatitis (AD)

Exclusion Criteria:

\- Lacks stable diagnosis of atopic dermatitis or has been diagnosed with mild atopic dermatitis.

outcomeMeasures.title: The Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group That Have Clinical Success
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinical Success defined using the following scores at Visit 4 (Day 28 ± 2): At least a 2-grade improvement from the baseline IGA score (i.e., clear \[0\] or almost clear \[1\]) AND A score of clear or mild (0 or 1) for both erythema and induration/papulation/edema

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in %BSA Affected at Day 28 ± 2
outcomeMeasures.description: The change in %BSA Affected from Visit 1 Baseline (Day 1) to Visit 4 End of Treatment (Day 28 ± 2)
